Bash(gh pr create --base main --head master --title "Refactor: Add useFormValidation hook" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Add `useFormValidation` hook with declarative validation rules and common validators
- Refactor `CreateClientModal`, `Login`, and `Register` pages to use the new hook
- Reduce ~55 lines of duplicated form state management across components

## Changes
| Component | Before | After |
|-----------|--------|-------|
| CreateClientModal | 5 useState hooks | 1 useFormValidation |
| Login page | 4 useState hooks | 1 useFormValidation + serverError |
| Register page | 5 useState hooks | 1 useFormValidation + serverError |

## New Hook Features
- Generic TypeScript support for form values
- Declarative validation rules with `commonValidators` \(required, email, minLength, maxLength, matches, etc.\)
- Per-field and form-level validation
- Touched state tracking
- `getFieldState\(\)` helper for input styling
- `isSubmitting`, `isValid`, `isDirty` computed flags

## Test plan
- [x] `npm run build` passes
- [ ] Verify CreateClientModal form validation works
- [ ] Verify Login page form submission works
- [ ] Verify Register page password matching and strength validation works

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")

- Footer with Pacioli motto: "Particularis de Computis et Scripturis"

Bash(git -C D:/Dev/Paciolus commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Add file upload drop zone to authenticated workspace view

The authenticated view was missing the actual file upload functionality -
it only had a placeholder message. Now logged-in users have full access
to the same diagnostic tools as guests:
- Drag & drop file upload
- Loading progress with row counter
- Results display \(balanced/unbalanced status\)
- Risk Dashboard with anomaly cards
- Key Metrics Section with ratios
- Sensitivity Toolbar
- PDF Export button

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C D:/Dev/Paciolus commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Sprint 31: Classification Intelligence - Fuzzy matching and suggestions

Backend:
- Levenshtein distance algorithm for fuzzy keyword matching
- fuzzy_match_score\(\) converts edit distance to 0-1 confidence
- ClassificationSuggestion dataclass for alternative classifications
- _generate_suggestions\(\) returns top 3 alternatives when confidence < 50%
- _generate_fuzzy_suggestions\(\) catches misspellings \(distance <= 2\)
- Updated ClassificationResult to include suggestions list
- Updated audit_engine.py to include suggestions in API response

Frontend:
- ClassificationSuggestion TypeScript interface
- Updated AbnormalBalanceExtended with suggestions array
- AnomalyCard "Did you mean?" collapsible suggestions UI
- One-click suggestion acceptance with Apply button
- Premium Oat & Obsidian styling

Zero-Storage compliant: Mappings remain session-only.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
